text: Mbega ntibagenda genda kuri iy’Isi turiko nukuraba ukugene yabaye amaherezo y’aba bantu bamyeho imbere yabo, nabo bari bafise ubushobozi buhanitse kubasumba, bakaba barima kuri iy’Isi nuku yiringaniza neza kubasumba uko bahora bayi ringaniza, n’intumwa zabo z’Imana zarabashikiye zifise ibimenyetso biri k’umugaragaro, rero Imana ntiyari kubahemukira, mugabo nibo bonyene bahemukiye imitima yabo
